content.text: Match ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Liverpool 2.
Second Half ends, Wigan Athletic 0, Liverpool 2.
Tiago Ilori (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Craig Davies (Wigan Athletic).
Joel Matip went off injured after Liverpool had used all subs.
Substitution, Wigan Athletic. Callum Lang replaces Ryan Colclough.
Substitution, Wigan Athletic. Joshua Gregory replaces Sam Morsy.
Attempt saved. Danny Ings (Liverpool) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ryan Kent.
Attempt saved. Tim Chow (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ryan Colclough.
Offside, Wigan Athletic. Lee Nicholls tries a through ball, but Craig Davies is caught offside.
Hand ball by Ryan Kent (Liverpool).
Attempt blocked. Danny Ings (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Substitution, Wigan Athletic. Luke Burke replaces Alex Gilbey.
Substitution, Wigan Athletic. James Barrigan replaces Sanmi Odelusi.
Foul by Sam Morsy (Wigan Athletic).
Ryan Kent (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Lucas Leiva (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Andrew Taylor.

Goal!  Wigan Athletic 0, Liverpool 2. Ben Woodburn (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ryan Kent with a through ball.
Goal!  Wigan Athletic 0, Liverpool 1. Danny Ings (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Lazar Markovic.
Substitution, Wigan Athletic. Craig Davies replaces Jordan Flores.
Attempt missed. Ryan Kent (Liverpool) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lazar Markovic.

Attempt missed. Lucas Leiva (Liverpool) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Danny Ings.
Attempt missed. Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Connor Randall.
Attempt missed. Yanic Wildschut (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Andrew Taylor.
